title: The Soul Camera by Kyle Harrison
description:
How to donate to Firefighters and relief for the Australian Fires

(https://www.cfa.vic.gov.au/about/supporting-cfa#donate-cfa
https://www.rfs.nsw.gov.au/volunteer/support-your-local-brigade
https://www.redcross.org.au/campaigns/disaster-relief-and-recovery-donate
https://www.wires.org.au/blog/emergency-donations-to-help-wildlife)

======================================================

A kinda famous urban legend. Take a picture and your soul gets trapped in the image.

Video!: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SQ0RORUDOso
Read along!: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B083RBWN5T/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_api_i_AkwyEbEXKM8DR

Aminooo!: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.narvii.amino.x220474164&hl=en_US & https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/mrcreepypasta-amino/id1142706153?mt=8

Check out my new books! A collection of Creepypastas compiled by some of my all time favorite authors and friends!
